existing_features.title: Lock district, state, and nation fields as read-only in all forms that collect address information (Careers, Vendors, AmbulanceServices, NgoListing)
Add post office name field to all forms that collect address information (Careers, Vendors, AmbulanceServices, NgoListing)
Auto-fill district, state, nation, and post office name fields when PIN code is entered in all address forms, using the existing pinCodeLookup utility
Update pinCodeLookup utility to return post office name in addition to city and state
Ensure only PIN code field accepts manual input in address forms; all other location fields (district, state, nation, post office) are auto-populated and read-only

new_feature_requests.summary: Lock district, state, and nation fields based on PIN code
Add post office name field to all forms
Auto-fill address fields when PIN code is entered
